au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=8m_central_apx7p5
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value #config.att = 330 #config.wavelength = 5 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 7200 config.det_offset = 0 #config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'g5' #config.apx = -47 config.bs = 1 config.beamcenterx = 94.8006 config.beamcenterz = 95.6597 config.drive()
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(30, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(30, 0) driveBsz(256)
